Test Name: Celiac Associated HLA-DQ Alpha 1 and DQ Beta 1 DNA Typing
Purpose: To detect HLA-DQ alpha 1 and beta 1 alleles associated with celiac disease, ensuring accurate, reliable, and reproducible genotyping results.
Container: Labeled microcentrifuge tube (200 ÂµL aliquot of whole blood)
Equipment: PCR thermocycler, microcentrifuge, DNA extraction kit, NanoDrop spectrophotometer, agarose gel electrophoresis apparatus
